alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 9:46AM MST until January 08 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low and Whiteriver. * WHEN...Until midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from 11 AM Today to midnight Tonight: Alpine 3 to 5 inches Pinetop-Lkside 5 to 9 inches Show Low 4 to 6 inches Whiteriver 4 to 6 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
